means: 对（某人或某事物）评价过低，低估（某人或某事物）( undervalue的现在分词 )

undertaking 承诺；企业undervalued currency 定值偏低的货币；低估通货underwrite 包销；承保
undertaking 承诺；企业undervalued currency 定值偏低的货币；低估通货underwrite 包销；承保
Avoid a tendency to undervalue yourself and your ability to make a worthwhile contribution ., 得避免低估自己与能力的倾向 , 来作出意义非凡的贡献.

entry.def: If you undervalue something or someone, you fail to recognize how valuable or important they are.

example.tran: 我们决不能低估自由的价值。

example.ex: Many companies deal with their female employees in a way that undervalues them.

auth_sentence.content: Undervaluing non-mathematical thinking ignores useful tools.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Undervaluing non-mathematical thinking ignores useful tools.

auth_sentence.content: It denies deliberately undervaluing its currency.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It denies deliberately undervaluing its currency.

auth_sentence.content: Washington says China is intentionally undervaluing the yuan to give Chinese exporters an unfair advantage.
auth_sentence.res_content: Washington says China is intentionally undervaluing the yuan to give Chinese exporters an unfair advantage.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Washington says China is intentionally undervaluing the yuan to give Chinese exporters an unfair advantage.
